item.title: Tenancy Dispute, Perth
item.description: Shane Mulligan vs Yuen Kit Chui Documents attached Residential Tenancies Act 1987 Lease agreement This is in the folder named contract. Evidence of cockroach infestation This is in the folder named evidence-of-cockroaches. Terminology Apartment: The Queens Gardens apartment on Forrest Ave, Unit 2. Kit: Yuen Kit Chui Shane: Shane Mulligan Claim I am seeking a court order to be sent to Yuen Kit Chui which states my right to give notice to my landlord for the termination of the fixed term residential tenancy agreement made between myself (Shane Mulligan) and my landlord (Yuen Kit Chui).
